title: Noob question about Tabis+Randuim
body:
What the math behind it?

If after armor mitigation you get critted for 700 damage lets say if you build tabi and randuim you will reduce the damage -32%? -20% from randuim and -12% from tabis? and yes i am talking about 100% crit AA

or it work somehow different?

replies.body: Tabi reduces the base damage of the auto attack by 12% then Randuim affects the Crit by 20%.

> [{quoted}](name=Soraka main btw,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=oJY2f2dI,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-04-24T02:20:27.685+0000)
>
> Tabi reduces the base damage of the auto attack by 12% then Randuim affects the Crit by 20%.

so 32% if the AA is crit
